# Hinata Theme

This is a simple customization of the standard **xaringan** theme. Colors are inspired by [Hinata Hyūga](https://naruto.fandom.com/wiki/Hinata_Hy%C5%ABga)<sup>*</sup> that is my favourite [Naruto's](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naruto) character.

```{r, fig.align='center', out.width="50%", echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("img/hinata.png")
```

.footnote[[1] Image Credit: [https://naruto.fandom.com/wiki/Hinata_Hy%C5%ABga](https://naruto.fandom.com/wiki/Hinata_Hy%C5%ABga)]

# Custom CSS Classes

You can make some text **bold** using standard markdown or you can use `.important[some text]` for .important[emphasizing some text].

There is a **final-slide** class for the last slide of the presentation

There is a **section** class for slide diveder between presentation sections (like the second slide)
